description.brazilian: Mate a Besta Horrenda em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Kill Horrendous Beast on any difficulty
description.russian: Сразите Чудовищную тварь на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Abata o Espectro Ancestral em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Slay Old Wraith on any difficulty
description.russian: Сразите Старого призрака на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Neutralize Blücher em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Neutralize Blücher on any difficulty
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте Блюхера на любой сложности

displayName.english: Only I Can Laugh at My Own Trauma
displayName.russian: Только я смеюсь над своей травмой

description.brazilian: Destrua o Príncipe Bispo em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Destroy Prince Bishop on any difficulty
description.russian: Уничтожьте Князь-епископа на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Destrua o Golem de Metal Ultraviolento em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Destroy Ultra Violent Metal Golem on any difficulty
description.russian: Уничтожьте Ультражестокого железного голема на любой сложности

displayName.brazilian: A Sanidade é o Valor a se Pagar pelo PODER?!
displayName.english: Is Sanity the Price to Pay for POWER!?
displayName.russian: Стоит ли платить здравомыслием за силу!?

description.brazilian: Abata o Espectro Aprimorado em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Slay Enhanced Wraith on any difficulty
description.russian: Сразите Улучшенного призрака на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Neutralize Cadilosh em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Neutralize Cadilosh on any difficulty
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте Кадилоша на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Mate a dupla de Demônios-Guardiões em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Kill Guardian Demon duo on any difficulty
description.koreana: 아무 난이도에서 수호자 데몬 쌍둥이를 잡으세요.
description.russian: Сразите дуэт Демонов-стражей на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Destrua o Receptáculo Horrendo em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Demolish Horrendous Vessel on any difficulty
description.russian: Уничтожьте Чудовищное судно на любой сложности

displayName.english: ...Or We Could Have Just Talked It Out.

description.brazilian: Neutralize Aio em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Neutralize Aio on any difficulty
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте Айо на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Derrote os Mentores de Gretel em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Defeat Gretel's Mentors on any difficulty
description.russian: Победите Наставников Гретель на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Derrote o Príncipe do Reino Caído em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Defeat the Prince of the Fallen Kingdom on any difficulty
description.russian: Победите Принца павшего королевства на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Rebata 100 projéteis
description.english: Deflect 100 projectiles
description.russian: Отразите 100 снарядов

description.brazilian: Conclua a luta contra o chefe 2-3 na dificuldade Ceifador com 8 Corações Espectrais em duas rodas de habilidades e Espinhos Penetrantes
description.english: Clear the Reaper difficulty 2-3 boss fight with 8 Wraith Hearts in two skill wheels and Penetrating Thorns
description.koreana: 사신 이상의 난도 2-3 보스전을 8개의 원령 심장을 두 스킬 그룹에 다 채워넣고 궤뚫는 가시 목걸이를 낀 상태로 클리어 하세요.
description.russian: Пройдите 2-3 на сложности Жнец, имея 8 Сердец призрака в обоих колесах умений, и надев оберег Пронзительный терн

description.brazilian: Conclua a luta contra o chefe 3-3 na dificuldade Ceifador e consiga o ranque SSS com 9+ contadores de KO de inimigos
description.english: Clear the Reaper difficulty 3-3 boss fight and get SSS rank with 9+ enemy KO counts
description.koreana: 사신 이상의 난도 3-3 보스전을 SSS 랭크와 9+ 의 적 KO 카운트를 내어 클리어하세요.
description.russian: Пройдите 3-3 на сложности Жнец, с рангом стиля SSS и 9+ К.О. противников

description.brazilian: Crie o primeiro conjunto de colar completamente equipado
description.english: Make the first fully-equipped necklace set
description.russian: Полностью укомплектуйте ожерелье оберегами

description.brazilian: Mate o chefe 4-2 com a granada curativa.
description.english: Kill the 4-2 boss with the healing grenade.
description.russian: Нанесите последний удар боссу 4-2 с помощью целебной бомбы

displayName.english: Hey, I Can Do That Too!

description.brazilian: Mate um demônio-hélice com a combinação de Lâmina Ciclone + Coração Espectral. (Lâmina Ciclone + Fonte Fungosa também funcionará)
description.english: Kill a propeller demon with the Cyclone Blade + Wraith Heart combination. (Cyclone Blade + Fungal Fountain also works)
description.koreana: 사이클론 블레이드 + 원령 심장(혹은 곰팡이 분수) 스킬 조합으로 프로펠러 데몬을 죽이세요.
description.russian: Убейте винтодемона с помощью комбо Гирошип (Ураганный клинок + Сердце призрака) или Гирокластер (Ураганный клинок + Источник грибков)

description.brazilian: Não use uma única prensa e vença o nível 5-2 na dificuldade Ceifador.
description.english: Don't use a single presser and beat 5-2 on Reaper difficulty.
description.koreana: 5-2 사신 이상 난도를 압착기를 한번도 사용하지 않고 클리어하세요.
description.russian: Пройдите 5-2 на сложности Жнец, не активируя ни одного пресса

description.brazilian: Salve todas as almas errantes.
description.english: Save all wandering souls.
description.russian: Спасите все заблудшие души

description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Ceifador, consiga os ranques SSS em todos os estágios do Ato 1.
description.english: On Reaper difficulty, get SSS ranks in every Act 1 stage.
description.koreana: 사신 난도에서 Act1의 모든 스테이지를 SSS랭크로 클리어하세요.
description.russian: На сложности Жнец, пройдите все уровни Акта 1 с рангом SSS

description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Ceifador, consiga os ranques SSS em todos os estágios do Ato 2.
description.english: On Reaper difficulty, get SSS ranks in every Act 2 stage.
description.koreana: 사신 난도에서 Act2의 모든 스테이지를 SSS랭크로 클리어하세요.
description.russian: На сложности Жнец, пройдите все уровни Акта 2 с рангом SSS

description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Espectro, consiga os ranques SSS em todos os estágios do Ato 1.
description.english: On Wraith difficulty, get SSS ranks in every Act 1 stage.
description.koreana: 원령 난도에서 Act1의 모든 스테이지를 SSS랭크로 클리어하세요.
description.russian: На сложности Призрак, пройдите все уровни Акта 1 с рангом SSS

description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Espectro, consiga os ranques SSS em todos os estágios do Ato 2.
description.english: On Wraith difficulty, get SSS ranks in every Act 2 stage.
description.koreana: 원령 난도에서 Act2의 모든 스테이지를 SSS랭크로 클리어하세요.
description.russian: На сложности Призрак, пройдите все уровни Акта 2 с рангом SSS

description.brazilian: Veja o final do Ato 1.
description.english: See the ending of Act 1.
description.russian: Завершите Акт 1

description.brazilian: Veja o final do Ato 2.
description.english: See the ending of Act 2.
description.russian: Завершите Акт 2

description.brazilian: Derrote a arena de desafio no nível 4-1 na dificuldade Ceifador ou superior.
description.english: Beat the challenge arena in 4-1 on Reaper difficulty or higher.
description.koreana: 사신 난도 이상으로 4-1 챌린지 아레나를 클리어하세요.
description.russian: Одолейте арену-испытание в 4-1 на сложности Жнец

description.brazilian: Derrote a arena de desafio no nível 7-2 na dificuldade Ceifador ou superior.
description.english: Beat the challenge arena in 7-2 on Reaper difficulty or higher.
description.koreana: 사신 난도 이상으로 7-2 챌린지 아레나를 클리어하세요.
description.russian: Одолейте арену-испытание в 7-2 на сложности Жнец

description.brazilian: Derrote o nível 7-2 em menos de 10 minutos na definição de dificuldade Espectro ou superior.
description.english: Beat the 7-2 under 10 minutes on Wraith or a higher difficulty setting.
description.koreana: 10분 이내로 원령 이상 난이도 세팅으로 7-2를 클리어하세요.
description.russian: На сложности Призрак или выше, пройдите 7-2 за менее чем 10 минут

description.brazilian: Conclua a luta contra o chefe 5-4 na dificuldade Ceifador e consiga um ranque SSS. O Choque Elétrico deve ser o seu golpe final.
description.english: Clear the Reaper difficulty 5-4 boss fight and get SSS rank. Electric shock must be your finisher move.
description.koreana: 사신 이상의 난도 5-4 보스전을 SSS 랭크로 클리어하세요. 전기쇼크 공격이 막타여야 합니다.
description.russian: На сложности Призрак или выще, пройдите 5-4 с рангом SSS, и нанеся последний удар боссу с помощью шокового взрыва

description.brazilian: Neutralize Igor em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Neutralize Igor on any difficulty
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте Игоря на любой сложности

description.brazilian: "Satisfaça" Opima em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: "Satisfy" Opima on any difficulty
description.russian: "Удовлетворите" Опиму на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Neutralize Cadilosh Mk2 em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Neutralize Cadilosh Mk2 on any difficulty
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте Кадилоша Mk2 на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Derrote o Coletivo de Pesadelos em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Defeat Nightmare Collective on any difficulty
description.russian: Сразите Собрание кошмаров на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Derrote a arena de desafio no nível 8-1 na dificuldade Ceifador ou superior.
description.english: Beat the challenge arena in 8-1 on Reaper difficulty or higher.
description.koreana: 사신 난도 이상으로 8-1 챌린지 아레나를 클리어하세요.
description.russian: Одолейте арену-испытание в 8-1 на сложности Жнец

description.brazilian: Colete todos os colares.
description.english: Collect all the necklace pieces.
description.russian: Соберите все обереги

description.brazilian: Colete todas as armas à distância.
description.english: Collect all the ranged weapons.
description.russian: Соберите все боевые навыки

description.brazilian: Veja o final do Ato 3.
description.english: See the ending of Act 3.
description.russian: Завершите Акт 3

description.brazilian: Derrote o Pai do Ninho Interior em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Defeat Inner Nest Father on any difficulty
description.koreana: 아무 난이도에서 내면의 둥지 교부를 쓰러뜨리세요.
description.russian: Сразите Явление Отца на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Neutralize Joonjo em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Neutralize Joonjo on any difficulty
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте Дзюнзо на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Derrote a dupla de demônios invasores em qualquer dificuldade
description.english: Defeat the duo invader demons on any difficulty
description.koreana: 아무 난이도에서 침략자 데몬 듀오를 쓰러뜨리세요.
description.russian: Сразите дуэт демонов-вторженцев на любой сложности

description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Ceifador, consiga os ranques SSS em todos os estágios do Ato 3.
description.english: On Reaper difficulty, get SSS ranks in every Act 3 stage.
description.koreana: 사신 난도에서 Act3의 모든 스테이지를 SSS랭크로 클리어하세요.
description.russian: На сложности Жнец, пройдите все уровни Акта 3 с рангом SSS

description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Espectro, consiga os ranques SSS em todos os estágios do Ato 3.
description.english: On Wraith difficulty, get SSS ranks in every Act 3 stage.
description.koreana: 원령 난도에서 Act3의 모든 스테이지를 SSS랭크로 클리어하세요.
description.russian: На сложности Призрак, пройдите все уровни Акта 3 с рангом SSS

description.brazilian: Derrote todos os estágios na dificuldade Espectro
description.english: Beat every stage on Wraith difficulty
description.koreana: 원령 난도로 모든 스테이지를 클리어 하세요.
description.russian: Пройдите все уровни на сложности Призрак

description.brazilian: Derrote todos os estágios na dificuldade Ceifador
description.english: Beat every stage on Reaper difficulty
description.koreana: 사신 난도로 모든 스테이지를 클리어 하세요.
description.russian: Пройдите все уровни на сложности Жнец

description.brazilian: Derrote todos os estágios na dificuldade Ceifador Ascendido
description.english: Beat every stage on Ascended Reaper difficulty
description.koreana: 승천 사신 난도로 모든 스테이지를 클리어 하세요.
description.russian: Пройдите все уровни на сложности Вознесенный Жнец

description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Ceifador Ascendido, consiga os ranques SSS em todos os estágios.
description.english: On Ascended Reaper difficulty, get SSS ranks in every stage.
description.koreana: 승천사신 난도에서 모든 스테이지를 SSS랭크로 클리어하세요.
description.russian: На сложности Вознесенный Жнец, пройдите все уровни с рангом SSS

displayName.brazilian: Não é um Problema de Habilidade

description.brazilian: Derrote o estágio 8-2 na dificuldade Ceifador ou superior, com todos os caças-níqueis incorretos no final.
description.english: Beat stage 8-2 on Reaper or higher, with all-mismatched slot machines at the end.
description.koreana: 사신 난도 이상으로 8-2 스테이지를 슬롯머신들을 전부 불일치 상태로 만든 다음 클리어하세요.
description.russian: На сложности Жнец или выше, пройдите 8-2 провалив каждую слот-машину

description.brazilian: Seja fixado pelos projéteis explosivos lançados pelo Ceifador-Pesadelo 30 vezes.
description.english: Get pinned by explosive projectiles thrown by Nightmare Reapers 30 times.
description.russian: 30 раз попадите под взрывающиеся снаряды, брошеные Кошмарными жнецами

description.brazilian: Vença a corrida de chefe, chegando até o seu final.
description.english: Beat the boss rush till the end.
description.russian: Пройдите режим босс-раш до конца

displayName.brazilian: Me Tornei a Morte, a Destruidora de Demônios
displayName.english: I Have Become Death Destroyer of Demons

description.brazilian: Vença o modo horda por completo.
description.english: Beat the full horde mode till the end.
description.russian: Пройдите режим орды до конца

description.english: Beat the hubris version of Blücher.
Beat the hubris version of Prince Bishop.

displayName.english: "Yeah, by the way, there's part 2. Remember?"

description.english: Beat the hubris version of Cadilosh.
Beat the hubris version of Aio.

displayName.english: They Were Holding Back on Normal

description.english: Beat the hubris version of the two mentors.
Beat the hubris version of Opima.

displayName.english: "Maybe it was a bit too far"
displayName.koreana: 그래, 솔직히 좀 막 나가긴 했다.

description.english: Beat the hubris version of Cadilosh MK2.
Beat the hubris version of Inner Nest Father.
Beat the hubris version of Joonjo.
Beat the Demon of Hubris.
Beat the hubris version of Demon of Hubris.
Enter the Chamber of Hubris. Welcome to your new grind.
description.koreana: 오만의 공간에 도달하세요. 진짜 노가다는 지금부터 시작입니다.

displayName.english: Hell Was Made in Your Pride
displayName.koreana: 이 지옥은 당신의 프라이드로부터 빚어진 것

description.english: Finish every stage with the Hubris challenge.
